name: Knock at the Cabin/Film synopsis
description: While vacationing at a remote cabin in the woods, a young girl and her parents are taken hostage by four armed strangers who demand they make an unthinkable choice to avert the apocalypse. Confused, scared and with limited access to the outside world, the family must decide what they believe before all is lost.

name: Dave Bautista heralds the apocalypse in M. Night Shyamalan's Knock at the Cabin trailer
description: M. Night Shyamalan is back, and he just might be bringing the end of the world with him. After we got the aging beach in the film Old and the creepy baby in his series Servant, the filmmaker has set his sights on a creepy cabin and the four strangers who terrorize its residents. The first Knock at the Cabin trailer, bringing to life author Paul G. Tremblay's horror novel The Cabin at the End of the World, arrived at the stroke of midnight on the West Coast Wednesday night. The movie, like the book, follows two dads who bring their child to a remote cabin for a vacation and are then visited and taken hostage by a quartet who demand the parents make an impossible choice. If they don't, it's apocalypse time.
